## Description {#details}

MI-level stackmap operands.

MI stackmap operations take the form: &lt;id&gt;, &lt;numBytes&gt;, live args...

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/stackmaps-h">StackMaps.h</a>.
